result.purpose: This folder contains templates for submitting various types of issues in a GitHub repository, including bug reports, feature requests, maintenance tasks, and questions.
result.architecture: The folder follows a simple structure where each YAML file serves as a template for different types of issues, promoting consistency and ease of use in issue tracking.

.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/bug-report.yaml.purpose: Template for submitting bug reports in a GitHub repository.

.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/feature-request.y.purpose: Template for proposing features or improvements for the Fiber framework.

.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/maintenance-task..purpose: Template for submitting maintenance tasks in the Fiber project.

.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/question.yaml.purpose: Defines a template for asking questions in the issue tracker.
